line: okay the reason why i asked you guys out to brunch today is because i have been doing some thinking about who should be my maid of honor
first of all um i love you both so much and you’re both so important to me
well umm i was thinking that maybe we could come up with a system where we trade off being maid of honor for each other
like hypothetically if phoebe were mine
if phoebe were my maid of honor
rachel would be phoebe’s i would be rachel’s that way we all get to do it once and no one would get upset
yeah that’s actually a pretty good idea
so who gets to be yours
umm you guys get to decide
wh why is that the best part
because then i don’t have to
well of course we will help you decide
we will do anything we can to help you
now i would like to make a toast to the future mrs
chandler bing my best friend and truly one of the nicest people that

aww and good luck to you too

joey this is die hard 1 again

yeah i just got uh got plans

all right well uh i’d better go

all right i’ll talk to you later
yeah hey a weird thing happened today when i was at brunch
this woman overheard that i was marrying you and and then she she wished me good luck
no it’s more like a good luck
so uh what did this woman look like
she was like 30 dark hair attractive
well is there any chance you were looking into a bright shiny thing called a mirror
come on was it somebody maybe you dated in college
no no i only dated two girls in college both blonde both not attractive hold on one second let me check this out
he gets up and grabs a photo album
well let’s see okay uh is that her
did you break up with her
yeah we went out for two summers and then i broke up with her
well ‘cause she came back the third summer and she’d gotten really fa aa aw ow
i said fa aa aw ow
you broke up with a girl because she was fat
yeah but it was a really really long time ago
well you know what they say elephants never forget
phoebe is gonna be monica’s maid of honor
well i hope it goes better than the last time you did it for that girl downstairs remember
you have been maid of honor before
this is exactly why you shouldn’t lie
because i cared enough to lie
hey hey hey hey i can help you decide who should do it
yeah we could have like uh like an audition and see how you’d handle maid of honor type situations
like when i want a job i go to an audition and if i’m the best of the people they see they give me the part
okay so after this audition who decides who gets it
oh uh me and ross can be the judges
well it’s better than us deciding
can’t we just flip a coin
we will let ross and joey decide
wow this cologne really is every bit as good as georgio
just uh brought back your videos
uh hey look uh ross look i think we need to talk about before
now look that was the best nap i ever had
i i don’t know what you are talking about
that was the best nap you ever had
it was the best nap ever
i want to do it again
do you want something to drink
i just figured out who you are
can you figure out what i’m doing
he was my best friend in fifth grade and and then one day i asked him to be my boyfriend and he said no
because you kept talking to him while he was trying to go to the bathroom
but because he thought i was too faaaaa
and every time i think about it it makes me feel as bad as i did in fifth grade
y’know i i really think that you should apologize to julie
it would make me feel better if lewis apologized to me
but i have to warn you this may make me a better person and that is not the man you fell in love with
okay all right this is how it’s going to work
we’re gonna give you hypothetical maid of honor situations and you will be scored on a scale of 1 to 10 1 being the highest
1 you’re with monica the wedding is about to start when monica gets cold feet
i don’t want to marry chandler
no one man for the rest of my life
i don’t know if i can do it
this means i’ll never get to sleep with joey
look monica getting cold feet is very common
y’know it’s it’s just because of all the anticipation and you just have to remember that you love chandler
and also i ran out on a wedding
you don’t get to keep the gifts
drawing on your own experience i like that
we’re now in the ceremony monica is about to say i do when her drunk uncle starts yelling
when monica was a little girl i remember that ooh
she just made a scene in the middle of the ceremony
do you want do you want a little taste of pheebs

ohh wait a minute we haven’t pre
umm webster’s dictionary defines marriage as okay
umm umm okay uh i met i i met i met monica when we were just a couple of six year olds and i became friends with chandler when he was 25 although he seemed like a six year old
umm i’ve known them separately and i’ve known them together and and to know them as a couple is to know that you are truly in the presence of love
so i would like to raise my glass to monica and chandler and the beautiful adventure they are about to embark upon together
i can think of no two people better prepared for the journey

okay i can’t believe that monica and chandler are getting married

chandler bing i i guess you remember me

ah uh i owe you a long overdue apology
i never should have broken up with you because you were overweight
that’s why you broke up with me
you you you didn’t know that
well i guess my work here is done
all right well first of all i would like to say that you both performed very well
you should be proud of yourselves
and and i would also like to say that in this competition there are no losers
i’m sorry rach it was it was really close
well then i demand a recount
you thing was so stupid anyway this was ridiculous we’re gonna flip a coin
the coins have finally forgiven me
i hope monica forgives you after you throw her her vegetarian voodoo goddess circley shower

i was thinking about maybe going upstairs and taking a little nap on my couch
why why would i care about that
no reason i’m just saying that uh that’s where i’ll be

are you gonna break up with me if i get fat again

a hundred and forty five pounds

you remember when umm you spent thanksgiving with us

you were not supposed to hear that
i said that behind you back
what if i have babies okay
i mean i’m gonna look different

look you have to realize i don’t think of you as a thin beautiful woman
see this is one of things that i can apologize for later

and i am in love with monica
so you can balloon up or you can shrink down and i will still love you

i’d carry you around in my pocket
skidmark’s still got a way with the ladies

but pheebs y’know you earned it
